fighting

クラス Motion

  • java.lang.Object
    • fighting.Motion

  • public class Motion
extends java.lang.Object
    キャラクターが使用できる全モーションのパラメータ及び，それに対応する画像を管理するクラス．

    • プロパティのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      タイプ プロパティと説明
      boolean isAttackDown
      プロパティattackDownPropertyの値を取得します。

    • フィールドのサマリー

      フィールド 
      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明
      private java.lang.String actionName
      This motion's name.
      private int attackActive
      The number of active frames of this motion.
      private boolean attackDownProperty
      The flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      private int attackGiveEnergy
      The value of the energy given to the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      private int attackGiveGuardRecov
      The number of frames that the guarding opponent needs to resume to its normal status when it is hit by this motion.
      private int attackGuardAddEnergy
      The value of the energy added to the character when this motion is guarded by the guarding opponent.
      private int attackGuardDamage
      The value of the damage to the guarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      private int attackHitAddEnergy
      The value of the energy added to the character when this motion hits the opponent.
      private HitArea attackHitArea
      The information on the attack hit box.
      private int attackHitDamage
      The value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      private int attackImpactX
      The change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      private int attackImpactY
      The change in the vertical speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      private int attackSpeedX
      The horizontal speed of the attack hit box.
      private int attackSpeedY
      The vertical speed of the attack hit box.
      private int attackStartAddEnergy
      The value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion.
      private int attackStartUp
      The number of startup frames required for this motion to become active.
      private int attackType
      The value of attack type.
      private int cancelAbleFrame
      The value of the first frame that the character can cancel this motion.
      private int cancelAbleMotionLevel
      The value of the level that can cancel this motion; during cancelable frames, any motion whose level is below this value can cancel this motion.
      private HitArea characterHitArea
      The information on the character's hit box.
      private boolean control
      The flag whether this character can run a motion with the motion's command.
      private int frameNumber
      The number of frames in this motion.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Image> imageList
      The list of data structure for image.
      private boolean landingFlag
      The flag whether a landing motion can cancel this motion.
      private int motionLevel
      The value of this motion's level.
      private int speedX
      The speed value in the horizontal direction that will be applied to the character when it does this motion.
      private int speedY
      The speed value in the vertical direction that will be applied to the character when it does this motion.
      private State state
      The resulting state after running this motion.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      Motion(MotionData motionData)
      指定されたデータでMotionのインスタンスを作成するクラスコンストラクタ.
      Motion(java.lang.String[] data, java.lang.String characterName, int playerIndex)
      指定されたデータでMotionクラスのインスタンスを生成するクラスコンストラクタ．

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      java.lang.String getActionName()
      Returns the name of this motion.
      int getAttackActive()
      Returns the number of active frames.
      int getAttackGiveEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy given to the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackGiveGuardRecov()
      Returns the number of frames that the guarding opponent needs to resume to its normal status when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackGuardAddEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy added to the character when this motion is guarded by the guarding opponent.
      int getAttackGuardDamage()
      Returns the value of the damage to the guarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackHitAddEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy added to the character when this motion hits the opponent.
      HitArea getAttackHitArea()
      Returns the hit area associated to this motion.
      int getAttackHitDamage()
      Returns the value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackImpactX()
      Returns the change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackImpactY()
      Returns the change in the vertical speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      int getAttackSpeedX()
      Returns the horizontal speed of the attack hit box.
      int getAttackSpeedY()
      Returns the vertical speed of the attack hit box.
      int getAttackStartAddEnergy()
      Returns the value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion.
      int getAttackStartUp()
      Returns the number of startup frames required for this motion to become active
      int getAttackType()
      Returns the value of the attack type:
      1 = high,
      2 = middle,
      3 = low,
      4 = throw,
      int getCancelAbleFrame()
      Returns the first frame in which this motion can be canceled.
      int getCancelAbleMotionLevel()
      Returns the maximum motionLevel a motion can have in order to be able to cancel this motion.
      HitArea getCharacterHitArea()
      Returns the hit area associated to this character.
      int getFrameNumber()
      Returns the number of frames in this motion.
      Image getImage(int nowFrame)
      Returns the current image of the character.
      int getMotionLevel()
      Returns the level of this motion.
      int getSpeedX()
      Returns the horizontal speed applied to a character using this motion.
      int getSpeedY()
      Returns the vertical speed applied to a character using this motion.
      State getState()
      Returns the state that is assigned to a character after this motion is completed.
      private Image invert(Image image)
      画像の画素情報を反転させる．
      boolean isAttackDownProperty()
      プロパティattackDownPropertyの値を取得します。
      boolean isControl()
      Returns the controllable state associated to this motion.
      boolean isLandingFlag()
      Returns true if the Landing motion can cancel this motion, false otherwise.

      Sets the number of active frames.

      Sets the flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      Sets the value of the energy given to the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      Sets the number of frames that the guarding opponent needs to resume to its normal status after being hit by this motion.

      Sets the value of the energy added to the character when this motion is guarded by the guarding opponent.

      Sets the value of the damage to the guarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      Sets the value of the energy added to the character when this motion hits the opponent.
      void setAttackHitArea(HitArea attackHitArea)
      Sets the hit area of this attack.
      void setAttackHitDamage(int attackHitDamage)
      Sets the value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      void setAttackImpactX(int attackImpactX)
      Sets the change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
      void setAttackImpactY(int attackImpactY)
      Sets the change in the vertical speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion
      void setAttackSpeedX(int attackSpeedX)
      Sets the horizontal speed of the attack hit box.
      void setAttackSpeedY(int attackSpeedY)
      Sets the vertical speed of the attack hit box.
      void setAttackStartAddEnergy(int attackStartAddEnergy)
      Sets the value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion
      void setAttackStartUp(int attackStartUp)
      Sets the number of startup frames required for this motion to become active
      void setAttackType(int attackType)
      Sets the value of the attack type:
      1 = high,
      2 = middle,
      3 = low,
      4 = throw,
      void setCancelAbleFrame(int cancelAbleFrame)
      Sets the cancelAbleFrame setting.
      void setCancelAbleMotionLevel(int cancelAbleMotionLevel)
      Sets the cancelAbleMotionLevel setting.
      void setCharacterHitArea(HitArea characterHitArea)
      Sets the character hit area of this motion.
      void setControl(boolean control)
      Sets the control flag.
      void setFrameNumber(int frameNumber)
      Set the number of frames in this motion.
      void setLandingFlag(boolean landingFlag)
      Sets the landingFlag setting, a flag encoding whether the Landing motion can cancel this motion.
      private void setMotionImage(java.lang.String characterName, int playerIndex)
      キャラクターの各モーションに対応するキャラクター画像を設定する．
      void setMotionLevel(int motionLevel)
      Sets the motionLevel of this motion.
      void setMotionName(java.lang.String motionName)
      Sets the name of this motion.
      void setSpeedX(int speedX)
      Sets the speedX setting, which stores the horizontal speed applied to a character using this motion.
      void setSpeedY(int speedY)
      Sets the speedY setting, which stores the vertical speed applied to a character using this motion.
      void setState(State state)
      Sets the state setting, which represents the state assigned to the character at the end of this motion.

    • フィールドの詳細

      • actionName

        private java.lang.String actionName
        This motion's name.

      • frameNumber

        private int frameNumber
        The number of frames in this motion.

      • speedX

        private int speedX
        The speed value in the horizontal direction that will be applied to the character when it does this motion.

      • speedY

        private int speedY
        The speed value in the vertical direction that will be applied to the character when it does this motion.

      • characterHitArea

        private HitArea characterHitArea
        The information on the character's hit box.

      • state

        private State state
        The resulting state after running this motion.

      • attackHitArea

        private HitArea attackHitArea
        The information on the attack hit box.

      • attackSpeedX

        private int attackSpeedX
        The horizontal speed of the attack hit box.

      • attackSpeedY

        private int attackSpeedY
        The vertical speed of the attack hit box.

      • attackStartUp

        private int attackStartUp
        The number of startup frames required for this motion to become active.

      • attackActive

        private int attackActive
        The number of active frames of this motion.

      • attackHitDamage

        private int attackHitDamage
        The value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      • attackGuardDamage

        private int attackGuardDamage
        The value of the damage to the guarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      • attackStartAddEnergy

        private int attackStartAddEnergy
        The value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion.

      • attackHitAddEnergy

        private int attackHitAddEnergy
        The value of the energy added to the character when this motion hits the opponent.

      • attackGuardAddEnergy

        private int attackGuardAddEnergy
        The value of the energy added to the character when this motion is guarded by the guarding opponent.

      • attackGiveEnergy

        private int attackGiveEnergy
        The value of the energy given to the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      • attackImpactX

        private int attackImpactX
        The change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      • attackImpactY

        private int attackImpactY
        The change in the vertical speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      • attackGiveGuardRecov

        private int attackGiveGuardRecov
        The number of frames that the guarding opponent needs to resume to its normal status when it is hit by this motion.

      • attackType

        private int attackType
        The value of attack type.
        1: high
        2: middle
        3: low
        4: throw

      • attackDownProperty

        private boolean attackDownProperty
        The flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion.

      • cancelAbleFrame

        private int cancelAbleFrame
        The value of the first frame that the character can cancel this motion.
        If this motion has reached this timing, it can be canceled with a motion having a lower value of motionLevel; if this motion has no cancelable period, the returned value will be -1.

      • cancelAbleMotionLevel

        private int cancelAbleMotionLevel
        The value of the level that can cancel this motion; during cancelable frames, any motion whose level is below this value can cancel this motion.

      • motionLevel

        private int motionLevel
        The value of this motion's level.
        関連項目:
        cancelAbleMotionLevel, cancelAbleFrame

      • control

        private boolean control
        The flag whether this character can run a motion with the motion's command.

      • landingFlag

        private boolean landingFlag
        The flag whether a landing motion can cancel this motion.

      • imageList

        private java.util.ArrayList<Image> imageList
        The list of data structure for image.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Motion

        public Motion(java.lang.String[] data,
              java.lang.String characterName,
              int playerIndex)
        指定されたデータでMotionクラスのインスタンスを生成するクラスコンストラクタ．
        パラメータ:
        data - Motion.csvから読み込んだキャラクターのパラメータ
        characterName - キャラクターの名前
        playerIndex - プレイヤー番号(0:P1 1:P2)

      • Motion

        public Motion(MotionData motionData)
        指定されたデータでMotionのインスタンスを作成するクラスコンストラクタ.
        シミュレータ内でのみ呼び出される.
        パラメータ:
        motionData - モーションデータ
        関連項目:
        MotionData

        private void setMotionImage(java.lang.String characterName,
                            int playerIndex)
        キャラクターの各モーションに対応するキャラクター画像を設定する．
        パラメータ:
        characterName - キャラクターの名前
        playerIndex - プレイヤー番号(0:P1 1:P2)

      • invert

        private Image invert(Image image)
        画像の画素情報を反転させる．
        パラメータ:
        image - 入力画像
        戻り値:
        反転された画像
        関連項目:
        Image

        public int getAttackHitDamage()
        Returns the value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
        戻り値:
        the value of the damage to the unguarding opponent when it is hit by this motion

      • getAttackGuardDamage

        public int getAttackGuardDamage()
        Returns the value of the damage to the guarding opponent when it is hit by this motion.
        戻り値:
        the value of the damage to the guarding opponent when it is hit by this motion

      • isControl

        public boolean isControl()
        Returns the controllable state associated to this motion. If the flag is false, a character using this motion cannot be controlled until this motion finishes.
        戻り値:
        true if a character using this motion is controllable, false otherwise

      • getAttackStartAddEnergy

        public int getAttackStartAddEnergy()
        Returns the value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion.
        戻り値:
        the value of the energy added to the character when it uses this motion

      • getCancelAbleFrame

        public int getCancelAbleFrame()
        Returns the first frame in which this motion can be canceled. Notice that only a motion whose motionLevel is lower than the cancelAbleMotionLevel of this one can cancel this motion.
        戻り値:
        the first frame in which this motion can be canceled

      • getAttackHitAddEnergy

        public int getAttackHitAddEnergy()
        Returns the value of the energy added to the character when this motion hits the opponent.
        戻り値:
        the value of the energy added to the character when this motion hits the opponent

      • getAttackGuardAddEnergy

        public int getAttackGuardAddEnergy()
        Returns the value of the energy added to the character when this motion is guarded by the guarding opponent.
        戻り値:
        the value of the energy added to the character when this motion is guarded by the guarding opponent

      • getAttackGiveEnergy

        public int getAttackGiveEnergy()
        Returns the value of the energy given to the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
        戻り値:
        the value of the energy given to the opponent when it is hit by this motion

      • getAttackImpactX

        public int getAttackImpactX()
        Returns the change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
        戻り値:
        the change in the horizontal speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion

      • getAttackImpactY

        public int getAttackImpactY()
        Returns the change in the vertical speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
        戻り値:
        the change in the vertical speed of the opponent when it is hit by this motion

      • getAttackGiveGuardRecov

        public int getAttackGiveGuardRecov()
        Returns the number of frames that the guarding opponent needs to resume to its normal status when it is hit by this motion.
        戻り値:
        the number of frames that the guarding opponent needs to resume to its normal status when it is hit by this motion

      • getAttackType

        public int getAttackType()
        Returns the value of the attack type:
        1 = high,
        2 = middle,
        3 = low,
        4 = throw,
        戻り値:
        the value of the attack type

      • isAttackDownProperty

        public boolean isAttackDownProperty()
        プロパティattackDownPropertyの値を取得します。

      • getCancelAbleMotionLevel

        public int getCancelAbleMotionLevel()
        Returns the maximum motionLevel a motion can have in order to be able to cancel this motion.
        戻り値:
        the maximum motionLevel a motion can have in order to be able to cancel this motion.

      • getMotionLevel

        public int getMotionLevel()
        Returns the level of this motion.
        Notice that this motion can cancel other motions (after their cancelAbleFrame) if such motions have a cancelAbleMotionLevel higher than the level of this motion.
        戻り値:
        the level of this motion

      • isLandingFlag

        public boolean isLandingFlag()
        Returns true if the Landing motion can cancel this motion, false otherwise.
        戻り値:
        the boolean value that expresses whether or not character lands in this motion.

      • getImage

        public Image getImage(int nowFrame)
        Returns the current image of the character.
        パラメータ:
        nowFrame - the current frame
        戻り値:
        the current image of the character

        パラメータ:

      • setControl

        public void setControl(boolean control)
        Sets the control flag. If the flag is false, a character using this motion cannot be controlled until this motion finishes.
        パラメータ:
        control - the boolean value to give to the flag

      • setAttackDownProperty

        public void setAttackDownProperty(boolean attackDownProperty)
        Sets the flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion.
        パラメータ:
        attackDownProperty - the flag whether this motion can push down the opponent when it is hit by this motion

      • setCancelAbleFrame

        public void setCancelAbleFrame(int cancelAbleFrame)
        Sets the cancelAbleFrame setting. This indicates the first frame when this motion can be cancelled.
        パラメータ:
        cancelAbleFrame - the value to assign to the cancelAbleFrame setting

      • setCancelAbleMotionLevel

        public void setCancelAbleMotionLevel(int cancelAbleMotionLevel)
        Sets the cancelAbleMotionLevel setting. This indicates the maximum level that a motion can have to be able to cancel this motion. During cancelable frames, a motion whose level is below this value can cancel the current motion.
        パラメータ:
        cancelAbleMotionLevel - the value to assign to the cancelAbleMotionLevel setting

      • setMotionLevel

        public void setMotionLevel(int motionLevel)
        Sets the motionLevel of this motion.
        パラメータ:
        motionLevel - the value to assign to the motionLevel setting

      • setState

        public void setState(State state)
        Sets the state setting, which represents the state assigned to the character at the end of this motion.
        パラメータ:
        state - the value to assign to the state setting

      • setLandingFlag

        public void setLandingFlag(boolean landingFlag)
        Sets the landingFlag setting, a flag encoding whether the Landing motion can cancel this motion.
        パラメータ:
        landingFlag - the value to assign to the landingFlag setting
